author: abcoathup
content:
Note: I am not an editor.

Ask the original authors if you can revive with you & your friend as authors.
* If they reply, then once added, move it back to draft or review.  You get to use the OG number.
* If they don't reply then create a new EIP/ERC and add the OG authors.  You will be assigned a new number.  In the discussions topic, link to the old EIP/ERC and discussion.

Mostly the OG number is the main difference.
